title: Bulgur wheat tabouleh
description: This bulgar wheat tabouleh recipe is a delicious summer snack and works well with barbecued chicken breast.
ingredients: Bunch of spring onions or 1 small red onion, finely chopped
Large bunch of fresh flatleaf parsley, finely chopped
Large bunch of fresh mint, chopped

method.Step 1: Place the bulgur wheat in a large bowl and pour over boiling water until just covered. Cover with a clean tea towel and stand for 15 minutes, until tender. Drain the bulgur wheat well and place in a sieve. Squeeze out the excess water using a spoon.

method.Step 2: Place the cucumber, tomatoes, onions and herbs in a large bowl and toss together well. Add the drained bulgur wheat, garlic, olive oil and lemon juice and season well to taste.

method.Step 3: Serve with griddled or barbecued chicken breast.
